verses.verse: My son, <WH1121> if you will receive <WH3947> my words, <WH561> and store <WH6845> up my commandments within you; <WH4687>
So as to turn <WH7181> your ear <WH241> to wisdom, <WH2451> and apply <WH5186> your heart <WH3820> to understanding; <WH8394>
Yes, <WH7121> if you call out for discernment, <WH998> and lift up <WH5414> your voice <WH6963> for understanding; <WH8394>
If you seek <WH1245> her as silver, <WH3701> and search <WH2664> for her as for hidden treasures: <WH4301>
then you will understand <WH995> the fear <WH3374> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and find <WH4672> the knowledge <WH1847> of God. <WH430>
For Yahweh <WH3068> gives <WH5414> wisdom. <WH2451> Out of his mouth <WH6310> comes knowledge <WH1847> and understanding. <WH8394>
He lays up <WH6845> sound wisdom <WH8454> for the upright. <WH3477> He is a shield <WH4043> to those who walk <WH1980> in integrity; <WH8537>
that he may guard <WH5341> the paths <WH734> of justice, <WH4941> and preserve <WH8104> the way <WH1870> of his saints. <WH2623>
Then you will understand <WH995> righteousness <WH6664> and justice, <WH4941> equity <WH4339> and every good <WH2896> path. <WH4570>
For wisdom <WH2451> will enter <WH935> into your heart. <WH3820> Knowledge <WH1847> will be pleasant <WH5276> to your soul. <WH5315>
Discretion <WH4209> will watch <WH8104> over you. <WH8394> Understanding will keep you, <WH8104>
to deliver <WH5337> you from the way <WH1870> of evil, <WH7451> from the men <WH376> who speak <WH1696> perverse things; <WH8419>
who forsake <WH5800> the paths <WH734> of uprightness, <WH3476> to walk <WH3212> in the ways <WH1870> of darkness; <WH2822>
who rejoice <WH8056> to do <WH6213> evil, <WH7451> and delight <WH1523> in the perverseness <WH8419> of evil; <WH7451>
who are crooked <WH6141> in their ways, <WH734> and wayward <WH3868> in their paths: <WH4570>
To deliver <WH5337> you from the strange <WH2114> woman, <WH802> even from the foreigner <WH5237> who flatters <WH2505> with her words; <WH561>
who forsakes <WH5800> the friend <WH441> of her youth, <WH5271> and forgets <WH7911> the covenant <WH1285> of her God: <WH430>
for her house <WH1004> leads down <WH7743> to death, <WH4194> her paths <WH4570> to the dead. <WH7496>
None who go <WH935> to her return again, <WH7725> neither do they attain <WH5381> to the paths <WH734> of life: <WH2416>
that you may walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of good <WH2896> men, <WH8104> and keep the paths <WH734> of the righteous. <WH6662>
For the upright <WH3477> will dwell <WH7931> in the land. <WH776> The perfect <WH8549> will remain in it. <WH3498>
But the wicked <WH7563> will be cut off <WH3772> from the land. <WH776> The treacherous <WH898> will be rooted out of it. <WH5255>
